title: Ephemera, Album, Autograph Album
description:
Album contains a selection of 14 hand-colored engravings, sketches and embroidery.  The initials "F. C. B." embossed on the leather front cover.

1.  Hand-colored engraving
2.  Embroidered flower on paper - loose in album
3.  Hand painted cartouche - loose in album
4.  Hand painted design, parasol & fan - loose in album
5.  Pencil sketch, woman
6.  Embroidered tree & urn - fabric adhered to page
7.  Hand-colored engraving
8.  Embroidered urn & palm design - to page
9.  Freehand sketch & painted roses
10. Painted figure w/wreath
11. Painted portrait, "Symphathie"
12. Figure with cupid, "L'Amour"
13. Grisaille painted of figure of death
14.  Painted, woman with lamb

tombstone.epitaph:
Ephemera, Album, Autograph Album. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1980-32-1646
